channel.title: Somethin not rite

item.title: Somethin not rite
item.dc:creator: @Haxor_X Haxor X
item.description:
@Haxor_X wrote:

…ok i added a fishing spot and its supposed to do something when i click on it i added all the codes and everything…

heres is the codes…

if (NPCID == 310 && playerLevel[10] <= 37) { //Lure Fishing skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; fishingtrout(); } else if(NPCID == 310 && playerLevel[10] >= 38) { //Lure Fishing skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; fishingsalmon(); }
ok well thats the code that tells it to go the public void NAMEHERE

heres the voids…

public void fishingtrout() { if(playerLevel[10] >= 17) { if(playerHasItem(309)) if(playerHasItem(314)) { actionTimer = 10; startAnimation(622); addItem(335,1); deleteItem(314, getItemSlot(314), 1); sendMessage("You Fish a trout"); addSkillXP((70), 10); } else { sendMessage("You Need a Fishing Level of 17 to fish Trout."); sendMessage("You Need Fly Fishing Rod And Feathers."); } } }

heres other viod…

public void fishingsalmon() { if(playerLevel[10] >= 38) { if(playerHasItem(309)) if(playerHasItem(314)) { actionTimer = 10; startAnimation(622); addItem(Item2.randomSalmon(),1); deleteItem(314, getItemSlot(314), 1); sendMessage("You Fish a salmon"); addSkillXP((90), 10); } else { sendMessage("You Need a Fishing Level of 38 to fish Salmon."); sendMessage("You Need Fly Fishing Rod And Feathers."); } } }

i don’t have the rite equipment so it should say you need a fishing lvl of ## and "equipment to fish “NAME OF FISH”
but when i click on it absolutely nothing happens tell me whats wrong with this…

i did it for cage fishing and it worked so i dunno why this isn’t working…

____________________________________________________________________________–
HELLO???
anyone going to help me???
i need help ASAP…
my servers fishing skill is messed up till this is fixed…
